replies.body: ill except anything if its a heckin taliyah skin ffs I NEED IT{{champion:163}}
fking SAMEEE i want a new one SOOO BAD ;W; and i hope it's good
Can you explain the concept? Is this Taliyah if she worked for Demacia?
I don't really have idea behind it but at some point I noticed its not just another pirat from Bilgerat, she can totally be some demacian captain.

i like the idea of the more 'good' aligned characters as privateers...basically pirates, but working for a government, haha. so, a sorta legal pirate. i would assume they would still have nice uniforms and all that

> [{quoted}](name=Dewiro,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=VeOLjm7E,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-10-24T15:17:25.041+0000)
>
> I don't really have idea behind it but at some point I noticed its not just another pirat from Bilgerat, she can totally be some demacian captain.

I would place her in Piltover, considering Demacia is 200% anti magic (sometimes).
True tho Piltover is on the tech side and this skin lacks tech parts. Ionia maybe ?

so it's kinda like captain fortune? i like that ^^ i feel she'd be more of a ship mate but this is a nice unique idea, her abilities could be pirate themed such as she rides a little ship, her q chucks barrels? or water? w can be a barrel or cracken popping up or maybe a treasure chest? e can be dabloons or treasure chests that pop open when knocked into? and her ulti can be a big wave of dark ocean water while riding a ship maybe with a cracken and fish in it? i'm extra af xDD i just love Taliyah so much she NEEDS  new skins ;-;

It looks cool but...Captain of what :v?

Isn't she like a nomad?
Oh I never would have imagine Taliyah in this skin line but this is a cool idea and lovely execution! :D
Well I got this random idea and it worked somehow. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Ve1vet,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=VeOLjm7E,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-23T23:42:34.886+0000)
>
> Oh I never would have imagine Taliyah in this skin line but this is a cool idea and lovely execution! :D

But back in the day they were rolling out Pirate themed skins left and right, Tristana? Ryze? Fiddlesticks? Sure why not!

I think that's the thing!
Any champion can fit any skin line.
It just requires enough imagination and a good execution.
